glsa.title: TeX Live: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in texlive-core, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: TeX Live is a complete TeX distribution.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in texlive-core. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: These vulnerabilities might allow user-assisted remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a specially-crafted DVI file, or cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All texlive-core users should upgrade to the latest version:
